Info:

The Haunted was an extended E.P. that featured Hybrid Moments debut the Marilyn E.P. in a remixed and remastered package along with bonus tracks I Turned Into A Martian, and London Dungeon as Misfits covers, and the title track single The Haunted. This CD also featured an extra track at 7:06 (666) on the last song of the CD. This is also featured in this digital version. 
There were only 100 of these CD's ever pressed! It's amazing to see that 10 years later, this album has become an underground cult classic in so many different countries in the form of internet file sharing, and fan made YouTube videos. This band was a great time in our lives, and we appreciate all of you fiends out there who are keeping it alive!
credits
released 31 October 2004 

Jeff Hearse She-Vocals 
Paul Bearer-Bass 
Migal Maul-Guitar 
Clodes-Drums 

Recorded August 2004 by Roger Camero at Where Pigs Fly Studios in Ventura, CA 
Mastered by Paul Miner
